topics.title: Musical Notes
topics.description: Learn the seven basic notes (A, B, C, D, E, F, G) and their role in creating melodies.

topics.title: Scales
topics.description: Understand major and minor scales, and how they form the foundation of music.

topics.title: Chords
topics.description: Discover how chords are built and how they bring harmony to music.

topics.title: Rhythm
topics.description: Explore beats, tempo, and time signatures that give music its pace.
